document.topic_text: Judy Hughes Music Foundation, Inc. Press Release Receive press releases from Judy Hughes Music Foundation, Inc.: By Email RSS Feeds: Songs of Freedom - Concert & Recital Judy Hughes Music Foundation, Inc. hosts a fundraising concert featuring Rebecca Cook-Carter, Erik D'Esterre, Linda Gebelein, Kathryn Reed, Jennifer Phelps and Mikie Huffman, called "Songs of Freedom." Immediately following the concert, music scholars from studios throughout the Lake Norman area will perform a recital. Judy Hughes Music Foundation, Inc. Is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization. Contributions are tax-deductible. jhmfinc.com email: staff@jhmfinc.com Mooresville, NC, Judy Hughes Music Foundation, Inc. and Lake Norman Lessons will host a fundraising concert at Southside Baptist Church; 525 Broad Street Mooresville NC 28115 on September 10th, 2016.The fundraiser will begin at two o'clock in the afternoon with a concert featuring Rebecca Cook-Carter, Erik D'Esterre, Linda Gebelein, Kathryn Reed, Jennifer Phelps & Mikie Huffman.Following the concert will be a recital featuring music scholars from different studios throughout the Lake Norman area.The fundraiser will celebrate patriotic selections as well as pieces which reflect sprtiual freedom.Judy Hughes Music Foundation Inc. provides musical necessities and scholarships to young people throughout the Lake Norman area who might not otherwise experience these opportunities.Judy Hughes Music Foundation, Inc. Is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization. Contributions are tax-deductible.www.jhmfinc.com staff@jhmfinc.com Judy Hughes Music Foundation, Inc.Mikie Huffman
